EmailTemplate.name: Partner Reconciliation Report Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Saddle Rock Legal Group Monthly Reconciliation Reporting Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This is a friendly reminder that your monthly reconciliation reports are due. - If you have already submitted your reports, please disregard this message. - Otherwise, please log into the portal and upload your most recent inventory reports.
If you need any assistance, feel free to contact us at partner_reports@saddlerocklegal.com.
Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter!
Best regards, Saddle Rock Legal Group
